sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_8659edf2073930100dc4fa7f7c1ed026
sys_update_xml.payload: standardc.sf-list{ padding: 0px; margin: 0px; .sf-list-item{ display: block; min-height: 50px; border-bottom: 2px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; text-align: center; position: relative; .sf-item-link{ display: block; pointer: cursor; text-decoration: none; padding: 10px; margin: 4px 0px; } } }sp_instance_menutitlefalsesly_fox_sidebar_menufalseSly Fox SideBar Menutruefalsesp_widgetadmin2021-08-09 20:05:218659edf2073930100dc4fa7f7c1ed02626Sly Fox SideBar Menuglobalglobalsp_widget_8659edf2073930100dc4fa7f7c1ed026admin2021-08-12 22:00:02

sys_update_xml.name: sp_header_footer_edbdb03607b530100dc4fa7f7c1ed01d
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.navbar { transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; border: 0; border-bottom: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; } .navbar-fade { opacity: 0.4; } .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle { border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); } header[role="banner"], .nav > li > a { max-height: 60px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .nav > li > a { padding-right: 0.5rem; padding-left: 0.5rem; } } .navbar-brand { max-height: 60px; padding: 0; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; } .navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span { margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y; margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y; display: block; max-height: $sp-logo-max-height; max-width: $sp-logo-max-width; position: relative; top: 50%; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); -ms-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); } .breadcrumb-container { background-color: $panel-bg; } /* for mobile app */ .navbar-inverse.is-native { background-color: #405060; } nav { margin-bottom: 0px; border-radius: 0px; .toggle-dropdown { height: 60px; } } .navbar-right { padding-right: 0px; padding-left: 7px; } .navbar-nav { margin: 0px; } // PRB711244: Dropdown menu is scrollable when too many items .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 80vh; overflow: auto; height: auto; } .is-native { .scrollable-dropdown { max-height: 100vh; overflow: scroll; height: auto; } } /* PRB923910: Fix for Service Portal - Header Poorly Aligned in Safari */ @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { .navbar-right { display: flex !important; height: auto !important; } } .sf-stock-header{ position: relative; .sf-side-bar{ position: absolute; bottom: calc(-100vh + 60); left: 0px; height: 100vh; width: 250px; z-index: 1000; border-right: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; transition: left 300ms ease; .sf-side-bar-tab{ position: absolute; right: -48px; top: 8px; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-top-right-radius: 4px; border-bottom-right-radius: 4px; border-left: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; z-index: 999; .glyphicon{ position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%,-50%); font-size: 24px; } } } .sf-side-bar.closed{ left: -250px; } } sp_instancefalsefalse 0) $(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse'); }); }]]>Sly Fox Stock Headertruefalsefalsesp_header_footeradmin2021-08-09 16:54:42edbdb03607b530100dc4fa7f7c1ed01d81Sly Fox Stock Headerglobalglobalsp_header_footer_edbdb03607b530100dc4fa7f7c1ed01dadmin2021-08-12 21:22:43
